abstract: United Parcel Service reports outlook for 2015 has been cut and warns that its fourth-quarter earnings will likely be $4.75 a share, down from forecast of $4.90 to $5 a share, citing heavy spending to prepare for holiday season.
lead_paragraph: The company said it expected 2014 earnings of $4.75 a share, down from its previous forecast of $4.90 to $5 a share.
snippet: The company said it expected 2014 earnings of $4.75 a share, down from its previous forecast of $4.90 to $5 a share.

headline.main: UPS Issues Profit Warning After Costly Holiday Season
headline.print_headline: UPS Issues Profit Warning After Costly Holiday Season
